name: Teeny Feat
description:
Teeny Feat is a platform and adventure video game, It's set in a fantasy world where the player can discover different ways to reach the objective, not all them are easy. 

Bronson, the main character, is a 10 years old boy, he  is looking for a quiet place away from so much hostility.

 The game has the following mechanics: movement, jump, double jump and attack with the sword. The player will have to collect magic stones, fight against the skeletons and  overcome  traps  to reach his objective.

It's still in development and there's some bugs, notify us if you find them. We will apreciate all your feedback and your recomendations for future updates, they're importat for us to improve the game experience. 

Enjoy, and thanks for playing! :):)
